sentences.sContent: A number of records fell during the sports meet.
sentences.sContent_eng: A number of records fell during the sports meet.
sentences.sCn: 在运动会上破了多项记录。

sentences.sContent: The success of the sports meet turns on the weather.
sentences.sContent_eng: The success of the sports meet turns on the weather.
sentences.sCn: 运动会能否成功要看天气如何。

sentences.sContent: Whether it rains or not, we’ll hold the sports meet.
sentences.sContent_eng: Whether it rains or not, we’ll hold the sports meet.
sentences.sCn: 不管下不下雨，我们都将举行运动会。
